```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  fig.keep = "all"
)
```

```{r}
library(texPreview)
library(slickR)
```

```{r}

objpath <- file.path(getwd(),"slickr_files/figure-html")

if(!dir.exists(objpath))
  dir.create(objpath,recursive = TRUE)

tex_opts$set(
  fileDir = objpath,
  returnType = 'html')
```

## Kable Input

```{r kable}

texPreview::texPreview(
  obj = knitr::kable(mtcars,'latex'),
  stem = 'kable-1'
)

```

## TeX Input

```{r tex}

tab='
\\begin{tabular}{llr}
\\hline
\\multicolumn{2}{c}{Item} \\\\
\\cline{1-2}
Animal    & Description & Price (\\$) \\\\
\\hline
Gnat      & per gram    & 13.65      \\\\
          & each        & 0.01       \\\\
Gnu       & stuffed     & 92.50      \\\\
Emu       & stuffed     & 33.33      \\\\
Armadillo & frozen      & 8.99       \\\\
\\hline
\\end{tabular}'

texPreview(
  obj = tab,
  stem = 'tex-1'
)
```

## Carousel [slickR htmlwidget](https://github.com/metrumresearchgroup/slickr)

```{r testOut3}
slickR::slickR(
  obj = list.files(
    objpath,
    full.names = TRUE,
    pattern = 'png'),
  width = '100%'
)
```
